marginalia.translation: Against the Alchocoden of the Arabs.

position.marginalia_text: De forma hominu[m] et etia[m] aliaru[m] rerum.

marginalia.translation: On the shape of men and also of other matters.

marginalia.anchor_text: Cum extraxeris figuram ex figura, pones ascendens iuxta rationem eleuationis poli super circulum positionis significatoris, hoc autem maxime in filijs

position.marginalia_text: Na[m] ex figura nati tum parentu[m] amicoru[m] [etc] fortuna[e]: aliq[u]o modo predici possunt. Ide[m] pene facim[us] cum ad eoru[m] significatores promissores vel bonos vel malos dirigim[us], iuxta circulu[m] positionis significator[um]

marginalia.translation: For from the figure of the birth, then of the parents, friends, et cetera, [and] fortune: they can be foretold in another way. We can almost do the same when we direct the promissors toward their significators, either good or bad, near the orbit of the significators' position

marginalia.anchor_text: Si daretur significator annoru[m] alius â significatore uitae, nemo biothanatus esset

position.marginalia_text: Ergo significator vita[e], etiam annoru[m] vita[e] spatiu[m] significat: et qui vita[e] longitudine[m] et statiu[m] declarat is et singulis et vltimo tempore,

marginalia.translation: Therefore the significator of life, even signifies the length of the years of life: and who declares the length of life and its condition, he even [declares the lenght] of delay and death, et cetera, in the first and in the last time.
